title: The Mystery of the Velvet Gown
description: "Shhh. We'll sneak up on him instead," she whispered to Brian and Honey. Stealthily, they crept forward in the quiet night. The silence was suddenly, sickeningly broken by the screech of tires and the thud of an impact--followed by a child's high, piercing scream. "That's Bobby!" Trixie cried...
author: Kathryn Kenny
